name: pipe-with-tool
description: An AI agent pipe that can call tools

messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.

function.name: getWeather
function.description: Get the current weather of a given location

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

function.name: calculator
function.description: A tool for evaluating mathematical expressions. Example expressions: '1.2 * (2 + 4.5)', '12.7 cm to inch', 'sin(45 deg) ^ 2'.
